ありはしない: (ありはしない) - doesn't even exist
ありゃしない: (ありはしない) - doesn't even exist
ありんす: (ありんす) - variation of "arimasu" used by the prostitutes of the Yoshiwara red light district in the Edo period
ありんすことば: (ありんすことば) - language used by the harlots of the Yoshiwara red light district during the Edo period
あり付く: (ありつく) - to get; to obtain; to come by; to find
あり合せ: (ありあわせ) - anything available; on hand; ready
あり合わせ: (ありあわせ) - anything available; on hand; ready
あり地獄: (ありじごく) - ant lion larva/doodlebug; ant lion larva's pit
あり得: (ありう) - to be possible; to be likely; to be probable
あり方: (arikata) - a maneira como algo deveria ser; o estado (atual) das coisas, como as coisas são
あり触れた: (ありふれた) - unsurprising; trite; commonplace; mundane; hackneyed; garden variety (of)
あるある: (あるある) - Oh yeah; Of course it is so; Cheer up, that's average; It happens; It's possible; Don't worry, it happens
あること無いこと: (あることないこと) - mixture of fact and fiction; half-truths
あるとき払い: (あるときばらい) - paying loan installments whenever one happens to have money (instalments)
あるに: (あるに) - and yet; even so; however
あるに任せる: (あるにまかせる) - to let things end up as they will; to let nature take its course
あるに従う: (あるにしたがう) - to let things end up as they will/to let nature take it's course; to make do with what one has
あるに違いない: (あるにちがいない) - there must be; you can be sure that
あるに違い無い: (あるにちがいない) - there must be; you can be sure that
あるらしい: (あるらしい) - seems to be; appears to have; supposed to be
ある事ない事: (あることないこと) - mixture of fact and fiction; half-truths
ある人: (あるひと) - someone (unspecified, but someone in particular); a certain person
ある意味で: (あるいみで) - in a sense; in some way; to an extent
ある意味では: (あるいみでは) - in a sense; in some way; to an extent
ある日: (あるひ) - one day (e.g. "one day while studying, ..")
ある時: (あるとき) - once (e.g. "once, when I was studying .."); on one occasion; at one point
ある時払い: (あるときばらい) - paying loan installments whenever one happens to have money (instalments)
ある程度まで: (あるていどまで) - to some degree; up to a point; to some extent
ある種: (あるしゅ) - certain; some kind of; some sort of; of sorts
ある限り: (あるかぎり) - all (there is); as long as there is
あれあれ: (あれあれ) - whoa (used to express surprise or stupefaction)
あれから: (あれから) - (also written 彼から) since then; after that
あれだけ: (あんだけ) - to that extent; to that degree; that much; that many
あれで: (あれで) - despite appearances; you mightn't think so, however ...
あれへん: (あれへん) - not; nonexistent; not being (there)
あれまあ: (あれまあ) - Good heavens!; Oh my god!; gee whiz
あれよあれよ: (あれよあれよ) - while surprised; suddenly
あれよあれよという内に: (あれよあれよといううちに) - while looking on in blank amazement; while gazing at it in shock
あれよあれよという間に: (あれよあれよというまに) - while looking on in blank amazement; while gazing at it in shock
あれよあれよと見る間に: (あれよあれよとみるまに) - while looking on in blank amazement; while gazing at it in shock
あれよあれよと言う間に: (あれよあれよというまに) - while looking on in blank amazement; while gazing at it in shock
あれ性: (あれしょう) - dry or chapped skin
あろうとなかろう: (あろうとなかろう) - whether or not; presence or absence
あわてん坊: (あわてんぼう) - flustered person; hasty person
あわや: (あわや) - in no time; in an instant; in the nick of time; in the twinkling of an eye
あわよくば: (awayokuba) - se houver uma chance, se possível, se as circunstâncias permitirem, se tudo correr bem, se a sorte estiver do meu lado
あわ立つ: (あわだつ) - to have gooseflesh (e.g. from cold or horror)
あんこ: (あんこ) - (Izu Oshima dialect) daughter/young lady; (hob:) young man/eldest son
あんこ型: (あんこがた) - {sumo}  sumo wrestler with a big belly
あんこ形: (あんこがた) - {sumo}  sumo wrestler with a big belly
あんだけ: (あんだけ) - to that extent; to that degree; that much; that many
あんだんすー: (あんだんすー) - (from アンダ + ミスー) fried mixture of minced pork, miso, mirin, etc. (Okinawan dish)
あんちょこ: (あんちょこ) - crib notes; key (to a diagram)
あんな: (あんな) - such (about something or someone distant from both speaker and listener, or about a situation unfamiliar to both speaker and listener); so; that; sort of
あんなあ: (あんなー) - look here; I'll tell you what
あんなに: (あんなに) - to that extent; to that degree
あんなー: (あんなー) - look here; I'll tell you what
あんな風に: (あんなふうに) - in that way; like that; that way
あんね: (あのさあ) - look here; I say; well; I know what; I'll tell you what; just a minute; hold on
あんま: (あんま) - not very (with negative sentence); not much (with negative sentence)
あんまし: (あんまし) - remainder/rest/balance/remains/scraps/residue/remnant; not very (with negative sentence)/not much; surplus/excess/fullness/too much; overjoyed/overwhelmed; more than/over
あん分: (あんぶん) - proportional division; proportional distribution
あん摩: (あんま) - massage, esp. the Anma Japanese type of massage; masseur/masseuse/massager; blind person (as many were traditionally massagers)
あん摩マッサージ指圧師: (あんまマッサージしあつし) - licensed masseur; licensed masseuse
あん肝: (あんきも) - monkfish liver; goosefish liver
あん馬: (あんば) - pommel horse/side horse; saddled horse
あーあ: (あーあ) - oh no (used as an expression of despair or when giving up); sigh of boredom or disgust; oh boy
あーた: (あーた) - you (often used by a wife addressing her husband)
あーん: (アーン) - opening wide/saying aah; crying loudly/wailing/balling
あ段: (あだん) - row of syllables on the Japanese syllabary table that ends with the vowel sound "a"
いい: (いい) - (adj-ix)   good/excellent/fine/nice/pleasant/agreeable; sufficient (can be used to turn down an offer)/ready/prepared; profitable (e.g. deal, business offer, etc.)/beneficial; OK
いいか: (いいかい) - Listen! (used to get someone's attention); You see .../Mind you .../Remember ...
いいかい: (いいかい) - Listen! (used to get someone's attention); You see .../Mind you .../Remember ...
いいかっこしい: (いいかっこしい) - acting cool; pretending to be a better person that one is; pretentious (person)
